mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file (card_id, uploader_id, file_name, file_path, file_size) VALUES (#{cardId}, #{uploaderId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize})
mapper.update: UPDATE file SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE card_id = #{cardId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE file f JOIN card c ON f.card_id = c.id SET f.deleted_at = NOW() WHERE c.list_id = #{listId} AND f.deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE file f JOIN card c ON f.card_id = c.id JOIN list l ON c.list_id = l.id SET f.deleted_at = NOW() WHERE l.board_id = #{boardId} AND f.deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE file f JOIN card c ON f.card_id = c.id JOIN list l ON c.list_id = l.id JOIN board b ON l.board_id = b.id SET f.deleted_at = NOW() WHERE b.team_id = #{teamId} AND f.deleted_at IS NULL
